section.title: ZSH
section.para: For compatibility with ZSH, there are two requirements that must be met.

listitem.para: The shwordsplit option must be set. There are three ways to accomplish this.
In the unit-test script, add the following shell code before sourcing the &shunit2; library.
When invoking zsh from either the command-line or as a script with #!, add the -y parameter.
When invoking zsh from the command-line, add -o shwordsplit -- as parameters before the script name.
